page.title: 18A FAMILY WEEKEND 2
page.content: I had to tidy my room up then which I hate doing.It's the smallest bedroom in the house(there are three).My older brother has the next biggest and then Mom and Dad the largest.This is unfair because they only sleep in it.Our house is on an estate and most of the houses look the same.I don't mind too much though because there is lots of countryside around and the beach is fairly near. I watched the 'Live-Aid' concert in the afternoon.This was also seen by 1\ billion other people and was to raise money for starving people in Ethiopia. Went to a pub for our tea.Lovely. Sunday was nice.We all went to the 'Pick your own' and got loads of Strawberries whci we had for tea. Sunday night is bath and hairwash. Watched TV-a movie,went to bed and read my Library book.Monday tomorrow.
